description: Medusa is the first main antagonist in Soul Eater. She is the witch who is the mother of Crona and manipulates Crona into collecting every soul they come across. She is the one that told Crona that it was okay to take any soul they wanted. When Crona starts to falter, Medusa plants a hypnotic spell in Crona`s mind that makes Crona want to fight and kill. She poses as a teacher and a nurse at Shibusen so she has access to all the students files.
name: Medusa
